title: Provenance Domain
description: Structured field for tracking data through transformations, including contributors, reviewers, and versioning.

name.description: Public searchable name for BioCompute Object

version.$comment: Records versioning of this BCO instance object; Semantic Versioning 2.0.0 (Major.Minor.Patch) is recommended

review.description: Describes the status of an object in the review process. The unreviewed flag indicates that the object has been submitted, but no further evaluation or verification has occurred. The in-review flag indicates that verification is underway. The approved flag indicates that the BCO has been verified and reviewed. The suspended flag indicates an object that was once valid is no longer considered valid. The rejected flag indicates that an error or inconsistency was detected in the BCO, and it has been removed or rejected. The fields from the contributor object (described in section 2.1.10) is inherited to populate the reviewer section.

reviewer.description: Name of the reviewer of the BCO

reviewer_comment.description: Optional free text comment by reviewer
examples: Approved by GW staff. Waiting for approval from FDA Reviewer

status.description: Current verification status of the BioCompute Object

derived_from.description: value of _id field of another bio compute object

obsolete_after.description: If the object has an expiration date, this optional field will specify that using the ‘datetime’ type described in ISO-8601 format, as clarified by W3C https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime.

embargo.description: If the object has a period of time during which it shall not be made public, that range can be specified using these optional fields. Using the datetime type, a start and end time are specified for the embargo.

created.description: Date and time of the BioCompute Object creation

modified.description: Date and time of the BioCompute Object was last modified

license.description: Creative Commons licence or other licence information (text) space. The default or recommended licence can be Attribution 4.0 International: for example https://spdx.org/licenses/CC-BY-4.0.html
